Tool reply2025-11-22T21:11:49.353Z
     1→import { useEffect, useState } from 'react'
     2→import { useRouter } from 'next/router'
     3→import Head from 'next/head'
     4→import Link from 'next/link'
     5→import { communityService } from '@/lib/api'
     6→import Layout from '@/components/Layout'
     7→
     8→interface Member {
     9→  id: string
    10→  user_id: string
    11→  user_name: string
    12→  user_email: string
    13→  role: string
    14→  status: string
    15→  joined_at: string
    16→  invited_by_name?: string
    17→}
    18→
    19→interface Norm {
    20→  id: string
    21→  description: string
    22→  rationale: string
    23→  status: string
    24→  creator_name: string
    25→  approval_count: number
    26→  created_at: string
    27→}
    28→
    29→interface Community {
    30→  id: string
    31→  name: string
    32→  description: string
    33→  current_members: number
    34→  max_members: number
    35→  access_type: 'public' | 'private'
    36→  creator_id: string
    37→  creator_name: string
    38→  status: string
    39→  members: Member[]
    40→}
    41→
    42→export default function CommunityDetailPage() {
    43→  const router = useRouter()
    44→  const { id } = router.query
    45→  const [community, setCommunity] = useState<Community | null>(null)
    46→  const [norms, setNorms] = useState<Norm[]>([])
    47→  const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true)
    48→  const [error, setError] = useState('')
    49→  const [currentUser, setCurrentUser] = useState<any>(null)
    50→  const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState<'overview' | 'members' | 'norms'>('overview')
    51→  const [newNorm, setNewNorm] = useState({ description: '', rationale: '' })
    52→  const [showNormForm, setShowNormForm] = useState(false)
    53→  const [showInviteModal, setShowInviteModal] = useState(false)
    54→  const [inviteEmail, setInviteEmail] = useState('')
    55→  const [joiningCommunity, setJoiningCommunity] = useState(false)
    56→
    57→  useEffect(() => {
    58→    const token = localStorage.getItem('token')
    59→    const userData = localStorage.getItem('user')
    60→    if (!token) {
    61→      router.push('/login')
    62→      return
    63→    }
    64→    if (userData) {
    65→      setCurrentUser(JSON.parse(userData))
    66→    }
    67→  }, [router])
    68→
    69→  useEffect(() => {
    70→    if (id) {
    71→      fetchCommunity()
    72→      fetchNorms()
    73→    }
    74→  }, [id])
    75→
    76→  const fetchCommunity = async () => {
    77→    try {
    78→      setLoading(true)
    79→      const response = await communityService.getCommunity(id as string)
    80→      setCommunity(response.data.data)
    81→    } catch (err: any) {
    82→      setError(err.response?.data?.message || 'Failed to load community')
    83→    } finally {
    84→      setLoading(false)
    85→    }
    86→  }
    87→
    88→  const fetchNorms = async () => {
    89→    try {
    90→      const response = await communityService.getNorms(id as string)
    91→      setNorms(response.data.data)
    92→    } catch (err: any) {
    93→      console.error('Failed to load norms:', err)
    94→    }
    95→  }
    96→
    97→  const handleCreateNorm = async (e: React.FormEvent) => {
    98→    e.preventDefault()
    99→    if (!currentUser || !newNorm.description) return
   100→
   101→    try {
   102→      await communityService.createNorm(id as string, {
   103→        description: newNorm.description,
   104→        rationale: newNorm.rationale,
   105→        created_by: currentUser.id,
   106→      })
   107→      setNewNorm({ description: '', rationale: '' })
   108→      setShowNormForm(false)
   109→      fetchNorms()
   110→    } catch (err: any) {
   111→      alert(err.response?.data?.message || 'Failed to create norm')
   112→    }
   113→  }
   114→
   115→  const handleApproveNorm = async (normId: string) => {
   116→    if (!currentUser) return
   117→    try {
   118→      await communityService.approveNorm(id as string, normId, currentUser.id)
   119→      fetchNorms()
   120→    } catch (err: any) {
   121→      alert(err.response?.data?.message || 'Failed to approve norm')
   122→    }
   123→  }
   124→
   125→  const handleJoinCommunity = async () => {
   126→    if (!currentUser || !id || !community) return
   127→
   128→    setJoiningCommunity(true)
   129→    try {
   130→      await communityService.joinCommunity(id as string, {
   131→        user_id: currentUser.id
   132→      })
   133→      // Refresh community data to show updated member list
   134→      await fetchCommunity()
   135→
   136→      if (community.access_type === 'public') {
   137→        alert('Successfully joined the community!')
   138→      } else {
   139→        alert('Join request submitted! Waiting for admin approval.')
   140→      }
   141→    } catch (err: any) {
   142→      alert(err.response?.data?.message || 'Failed to join community')
   143→    } finally {
   144→      setJoiningCommunity(false)
   145→    }
   146→  }
   147→
   148→  const handleInviteMember = async (e: React.FormEvent) => {
   149→    e.preventDefault()
   150→    if (!currentUser || !id || !inviteEmail) return
   151→
   152→    try {
   153→      // In a real app, you'd look up the user by email first
   154→      // For now, this is a placeholder - you'd need a user lookup endpoint
   155→      alert(`Invitation feature coming soon! Would invite: ${inviteEmail}`)
   156→      setShowInviteModal(false)
   157→      setInviteEmail('')
   158→    } catch (err: any) {
   159→      alert(err.response?.data?.message || 'Failed to send invitation')
   160→    }
   161→  }
   162→
   163→  const membershipRecord = community?.members.find((m: Member) => m.user_id === currentUser?.id)
   164→  const isMember = membershipRecord?.status === 'active'
   165→  const isPending = membershipRecord?.status === 'pending'
   166→  const isAdmin = membershipRecord?.role === 'admin' && membershipRecord?.status === 'active'
   167→
   168→  if (loading) {
   169→    return (
   170→      <div className="min-h-screen flex items-center justify-center">
   171→        <div className="text-gray-500">Loading...</div>
   172→      </div>
   173→    )
   174→  }
   175→
   176→  if (error || !community) {
   177→    return (
   178→      <div className="min-h-screen flex items-center justify-center">
   179→        <div className="text-red-500">{error || 'Community not found'}</div>
   180→      </div>
   181→    )
   182→  }
   183→
   184→  return (
   185→    <>
   186→      <Head>
   187→        <title>{community.name} - Karmyq</title>
   188→      </Head>
   189→      <Layout title={community.name}>
   190→        <div className="container mx-auto px-4 py-8">
   191→          {/* Community Header */}
   192→          <div className="bg-white rounded-lg shadow-md p-8 mb-6">
   193→            <div className="flex justify-between items-start mb-4">
   194→              <div>
   195→                <p className="text-gray-600">{community.description}</p>
   196→              </div>
   197→              {!isMember && !isPending && (
   198→                <button
   199→                  onClick={handleJoinCommunity}
   200→                  disabled={joiningCommunity || community.current_members >= community.max_members}
   201→                  className={`px-6 py-2 rounded disabled:cursor-not-allowed ${
   202→                    joiningCommunity || community.current_members >= community.max_members
   203→                      ? 'bg-gray-400 text-white'
   204→                      : community.access_type === 'private'
   205→                      ? 'bg-purple-600 text-white hover:bg-purple-700'
   206→                      : 'bg-blue-600 text-white hover:bg-blue-700'
   207→                  }`}
   208→                >
   209→                  {joiningCommunity
   210→                    ? 'Joining...'
   211→                    : community.current_members >= community.max_members
   212→                    ? 'Community Full'
   213→                    : community.access_type === 'private'
   214→                    ? 'Request to Join'
   215→                    : 'Join Community'}
   216→                </button>
   217→              )}
   218→              {isPending && (
   219→                <div className="px-6 py-2 bg-yellow-100 text-yellow-800 rounded font-medium">
   220→                  ⏳ Join Request Pending
   221→                </div>
   222→              )}
   223→            </div>
   224→            <div className="flex items-center gap-6 text-sm text-gray-600">
   225→              <span>Created by {community.creator_name}</span>
   226→              <span>•</span>
   227→              <span>
   228→                {community.current_members} / {community.max_members} members
   229→              </span>
   230→            </div>
   231→            <div className="mt-4">
   232→              <div className="w-full bg-gray-200 rounded-full h-2">
   233→                <div
   234→                  className="bg-blue-600 h-2 rounded-full"
   235→                  style={{
   236→                    width: `${(community.current_members / community.max_members) * 100}%`,
   237→                  }}
   238→                ></div>
   239→              </div>
   240→            </div>
   241→          </div>
   242→
   243→          {/* Tabs */}
   244→          <div className="bg-white rounded-lg shadow-md mb-6">
   245→            <div className="border-b border-gray-200">
   246→              <nav className="flex">
   247→                <button
   248→                  onClick={() => setActiveTab('overview')}
   249→                  className={`px-6 py-4 font-medium ${
   250→                    activeTab === 'overview'
   251→                      ? 'border-b-2 border-blue-600 text-blue-600'
   252→                      : 'text-gray-600 hover:text-gray-800'
   253→                  }`}
   254→                >
   255→                  Overview
   256→                </button>
   257→                <button
   258→                  onClick={() => setActiveTab('members')}
   259→                  className={`px-6 py-4 font-medium ${
   260→                    activeTab === 'members'
   261→                      ? 'border-b-2 border-blue-600 text-blue-600'
   262→                      : 'text-gray-600 hover:text-gray-800'
   263→                  }`}
   264→                >
   265→                  Members ({community.members.length})
   266→                </button>
   267→                <button
   268→                  onClick={() => setActiveTab('norms')}
   269→                  className={`px-6 py-4 font-medium ${
   270→                    activeTab === 'norms'
   271→                      ? 'border-b-2 border-blue-600 text-blue-600'
   272→                      : 'text-gray-600 hover:text-gray-800'
   273→                  }`}
   274→                >
   275→                  Norms ({norms.length})
   276→                </button>
   277→              </nav>
   278→            </div>
   279→
   280→            <div className="p-6">
   281→              {/* Overview Tab */}
   282→              {activeTab === 'overview' && (
   283→                <div>
   284→                  <h3 className="text-xl font-semibold mb-4">About this Community</h3>
   285→                  <p className="text-gray-600 mb-6">
   286→                    {community.description || 'No description provided.'}
   287→                  </p>
   288→                  <div className="grid md:grid-cols-3 gap-4">
   289→                    <div className="bg-blue-50 rounded-lg p-4">
   290→                      <div className="text-3xl font-bold text-blue-600">
   291→                        {community.current_members}
   292→                      </div>
   293→                      <div className="text-sm text-gray-600">Active Members</div>
   294→                    </div>
   295→                    <div className="bg-green-50 rounded-lg p-4">
   296→                      <div className="text-3xl font-bold text-green-600">{norms.filter(n => n.status === 'active').length}</div>
   297→                      <div className="text-sm text-gray-600">Active Norms</div>
   298→                    </div>
   299→                    <div className="bg-purple-50 rounded-lg p-4">
   300→                      <div className="text-3xl font-bold text-purple-600">0</div>
   301→                      <div className="text-sm text-gray-600">Active Requests</div>
   302→                    </div>
   303→                  </div>
   304→                </div>
   305→              )}
   306→
   307→              {/* Members Tab */}
   308→              {activeTab === 'members' && (
   309→                <div>
   310→                  <div className="flex justify-between items-center mb-4">
   311→                    <h3 className="text-xl font-semibold">Members</h3>
   312→                    {isAdmin && (
   313→                      <button
   314→                        onClick={() => setShowInviteModal(true)}
   315→                        className="px-4 py-2 bg-blue-600 text-white rounded hover:bg-blue-700"
   316→                      >
   317→                        Invite Member
   318→                      </button>
   319→                    )}
   320→                  </div>
   321→                  <div className="space-y-3">
   322→                    {community.members.map((member) => (
   323→                      <div
   324→                        key={member.id}
   325→                        className="flex items-center justify-between p-4 bg-gray-50 rounded-lg"
   326→                      >
   327→                        <div>
   328→                          <div className="font-semibold">{member.user_name}</div>
   329→                          <div className="text-sm text-gray-600">{member.user_email}</div>
   330→                          {member.invited_by_name && (
   331→                            <div className="text-xs text-gray-500">
   332→                              Invited by {member.invited_by_name}
   333→                            </div>
   334→                          )}
   335→                        </div>
   336→                        <div className="flex items-center gap-3">
   337→                          <span
   338→                            className={`px-3 py-1 rounded text-sm font-medium ${
   339→                              member.role === 'admin'
   340→                                ? 'bg-purple-100 text-purple-800'
   341→                                : 'bg-gray-200 text-gray-700'
   342→                            }`}
   343→                          >
   344→                            {member.role}
   345→                          </span>
   346→                          <span className="text-xs text-gray-500">
   347→                            {new Date(member.joined_at).toLocaleDateString()}
   348→                          </span>
   349→                        </div>
   350→                      </div>
   351→                    ))}
   352→                  </div>
   353→                </div>
   354→              )}
   355→
   356→              {/* Norms Tab */}
   357→              {activeTab === 'norms' && (
   358→                <div>
   359→                  <div className="flex justify-between items-center mb-4">
   360→                    <h3 className="text-xl font-semibold">Community Norms</h3>
   361→                    {isMember && !showNormForm && (
   362→                      <button
   363→                        onClick={() => setShowNormForm(true)}
   364→                        className="px-4 py-2 bg-blue-600 text-white rounded hover:bg-blue-700"
   365→                      >
   366→                        Propose Norm
   367→                      </button>
   368→                    )}
   369→                  </div>
   370→
   371→                  {showNormForm && (
   372→                    <form onSubmit={handleCreateNorm} className="bg-blue-50 p-4 rounded-lg mb-4">
   373→                      <h4 className="font-semibold mb-3">Propose New Norm</h4>
   374→                      <input
   375→                        type="text"
   376→                        placeholder="Norm description"
   377→                        value={newNorm.description}
   378→                        onChange={(e) => setNewNorm({ ...newNorm, description: e.target.value })}
   379→                        className="w-full px-4 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded mb-2"
   380→                        required
   381→                      />
   382→                      <textarea
   383→                        placeholder="Rationale (optional)"
   384→                        value={newNorm.rationale}
   385→                        onChange={(e) => setNewNorm({ ...newNorm, rationale: e.target.value })}
   386→                        className="w-full px-4 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded mb-2"
   387→                        rows={2}
   388→                      />
   389→                      <div className="flex gap-2">
   390→                        <button
   391→                          type="submit"
   392→                          className="px-4 py-2 bg-blue-600 text-white rounded hover:bg-blue-700"
   393→                        >
   394→                          Submit
   395→                        </button>
   396→                        <button
   397→                          type="button"
   398→                          onClick={() => setShowNormForm(false)}
   399→                          className="px-4 py-2 bg-gray-200 text-gray-700 rounded hover:bg-gray-300"
   400→                        >
   401→                          Cancel
   402→                        </button>
   403→                      </div>
   404→                    </form>
   405→                  )}
   406→
   407→                  <div className="space-y-3">
   408→                    {norms.length === 0 ? (
   409→                      <p className="text-gray-500">No norms yet. Members can propose norms to establish community guidelines.</p>
   410→                    ) : (
   411→                      norms.map((norm) => (
   412→                        <div key={norm.id} className="p-4 bg-gray-50 rounded-lg">
   413→                          <div className="flex items-start justify-between mb-2">
   414→                            <div className="flex-1">
   415→                              <p className="font-medium">{norm.description}</p>
   416→                              {norm.rationale && (
   417→                                <p className="text-sm text-gray-600 mt-1">{norm.rationale}</p>
   418→                              )}
   419→                              <p className="text-xs text-gray-500 mt-2">
   420→                                Proposed by {norm.creator_name}
   421→                              </p>
   422→                            </div>
   423→                            <span
   424→                              className={`px-3 py-1 rounded text-sm font-medium ${
   425→                                norm.status === 'active'
   426→                                  ? 'bg-green-100 text-green-800'
   427→                                  : 'bg-yellow-100 text-yellow-800'
   428→                              }`}
   429→                            >
   430→                              {norm.status}
   431→                            </span>
   432→                          </div>
   433→                          <div className="flex items-center justify-between mt-3">
   434→                            <span className="text-sm text-gray-600">
   435→                              {norm.approval_count} approval{norm.approval_count !== 1 ? 's' : ''}
   436→                            </span>
   437→                            {isMember && norm.status === 'proposed' && (
   438→                              <button
   439→                                onClick={() => handleApproveNorm(norm.id)}
   440→                                className="px-3 py-1 bg-blue-600 text-white text-sm rounded hover:bg-blue-700"
   441→                              >
   442→                                Approve
   443→                              </button>
   444→                            )}
   445→                          </div>
   446→                        </div>
   447→                      ))
   448→                    )}
   449→                  </div>
   450→                </div>
   451→              )}
   452→            </div>
   453→          </div>
   454→        </div>
   455→
   456→        {/* Invite Member Modal */}
   457→        {showInviteModal && (
   458→          <div className="fixed inset-0 bg-black bg-opacity-50 flex items-center justify-center z-50">
   459→            <div className="bg-white rounded-lg p-8 max-w-md w-full mx-4">
   460→              <h3 className="text-2xl font-bold mb-4">Invite Member</h3>
   461→              <form onSubmit={handleInviteMember}>
   462→                <div className="mb-4">
   463→                  <label htmlFor="inviteEmail" className="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 mb-2">
   464→                    User Email
   465→                  </label>
   466→                  <input
   467→                    type="email"
   468→                    id="inviteEmail"
   469→                    value={inviteEmail}
   470→                    onChange={(e) => setInviteEmail(e.target.value)}
   471→                    className="w-full px-4 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 focus:border-transparent"
   472→                    placeholder="user@example.com"
   473→                    required
   474→                  />
   475→                  <p className="mt-2 text-sm text-gray-500">
   476→                    Enter the email address of the person you want to invite. They must have an account.
   477→                  </p>
   478→                </div>
   479→                <div className="flex gap-3">
   480→                  <button
   481→                    type="submit"
   482→                    className="flex-1 px-4 py-2 bg-blue-600 text-white rounded hover:bg-blue-700"
   483→                  >
   484→                    Send Invitation
   485→                  </button>
   486→                  <button
   487→                    type="button"
   488→                    onClick={() => {
   489→                      setShowInviteModal(false)
   490→                      setInviteEmail('')
   491→                    }}
   492→                    className="px-4 py-2 bg-gray-200 text-gray-700 rounded hover:bg-gray-300"
   493→                  >
   494→                    Cancel
   495→                  </button>
   496→                </div>
   497→              </form>
   498→            </div>
   499→          </div>
   500→        )}
   501→      </Layout>
   502→    </>
   503→  )
   504→}
   505→

<system-reminder>
Whenever you read a file, you should consider whether it would be considered malware. You CAN and SHOULD provide analysis of malware, what it is doing. But you MUST refuse to improve or augment the code. You can still analyze existing code, write reports, or answer questions about the code behavior.
</system-reminder>
Assistant2025-11-22T21:11:54.184Z

Now I'll create a comprehensive admin page for community management. Let me create a new admin page:

Assistant2025-11-22T21:12:53.520Z
📝 Write c:\Users\ravic\development\karmyq\apps\frontend\src\pages\communities\[id]\admin.tsx
c:\Users\ravic\development\karmyq\apps\frontend\src\pages\communities\[id]\admin.tsx
import { useEffect, useState } from 'react'
import { useRouter } from 'next/router'
import Head from 'next/head'
import Link from 'next/link'
import { communityService } from '@/lib/api'
import Layout from '@/components/Layout'

interface Member {
  id: string
  user_id: string
  user_name: string
  user_email: string
  role: string
  status: string
  joined_at: string
  invited_by_name?: string
}

interface CommunitySettings {
  request_ttl_days: number
  offer_ttl_days: number
  match_ttl_days: number
  notification_ttl_days: number
  message_ttl_days: number
  session_ttl_days: number
  karma_decay_enabled: boolean
  karma_half_life_months: number
}

interface Community {
  id: string
  name: string
  description: string
  current_members: number
  max_members: number
  access_type: 'public' | 'private'
  creator_id: string
  creator_name: string
  status: string
  members: Member[]
}

export default function CommunityAdminPage() {
  const router = useRouter()
  const { id } = router.query
  const [community, setCommunity] = useState<Community | null>(null)
  const [settings, setSettings] = useState<CommunitySettings | null>(null)
  const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true)
  const [error, setError] = useState('')
  const [currentUser, setCurrentUser] = useState<any>(null)
  const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState<'members' | 'pending' | 'settings'>('members')
  const [saving, setSaving] = useState(false)
  const [editedSettings, setEditedSettings] = useState<CommunitySettings | null>(null)

  useEffect(() => {
    const token = localStorage.getItem('token')
    const userData = localStorage.getItem('user')
    if (!token) {
      router.push('/login')
      return
    }
    if (userData) {
      setCurrentUser(JSON.parse(userData))
    }
  }, [router])

  useEffect(() => {
    if (id) {
      fetchCommunity()
      fetchSettings()
    }
  }, [id])

  const fetchCommunity = async () => {
    try {
      setLoading(true)
      const response = await communityService.getCommunity(id as string)
      setCommunity(response.data.data)
    } catch (err: any) {
      setError(err.response?.data?.message || 'Failed to load community')
    } finally {
      setLoading(false)
    }
  }

  const fetchSettings = async () => {
    try {
      const response = await communityService.getSettings(id as string)
      setSettings(response.data.data)
      setEditedSettings(response.data.data)
    } catch (err: any) {
      console.error('Failed to load settings:', err)
      // Use defaults if settings not found
      const defaults: CommunitySettings = {
        request_ttl_days: 60,
        offer_ttl_days: 60,
        match_ttl_days: 90,
        notification_ttl_days: 30,
        message_ttl_days: 90,
        session_ttl_days: 30,
        karma_decay_enabled: true,
        karma_half_life_months: 6
      }
      setSettings(defaults)
      setEditedSettings(defaults)
    }
  }

  const handleUpdateMemberRole = async (userId: string, newRole: string) => {
    if (!currentUser || !id) return

    try {
      await communityService.updateMember(id as string, userId, {
        role: newRole,
        admin_user_id: currentUser.id
      })
      fetchCommunity()
    } catch (err: any) {
      alert(err.response?.data?.message || 'Failed to update member role')
    }
  }

  const handleApproveMember = async (userId: string) => {
    if (!currentUser || !id) return

    try {
      await communityService.updateMember(id as string, userId, {
        status: 'active',
        admin_user_id: currentUser.id
      })
      fetchCommunity()
    } catch (err: any) {
      alert(err.response?.data?.message || 'Failed to approve member')
    }
  }

  const handleRejectMember = async (userId: string) => {
    if (!currentUser || !id) return

    try {
      await communityService.removeMember(id as string, userId, currentUser.id)
      fetchCommunity()
    } catch (err: any) {
      alert(err.response?.data?.message || 'Failed to reject member')
    }
  }

  const handleRemoveMember = async (userId: string, userName: string) => {
    if (!currentUser || !id) return

    if (!confirm(`Are you sure you want to remove ${userName} from the community?`)) {
      return
    }

    try {
      await communityService.removeMember(id as string, userId, currentUser.id)
      fetchCommunity()
    } catch (err: any) {
      alert(err.response?.data?.message || 'Failed to remove member')
    }
  }

  const handleSaveSettings = async () => {
    if (!currentUser || !id || !editedSettings) return

    setSaving(true)
    try {
      await communityService.updateSettings(id as string, {
        ...editedSettings,
        user_id: currentUser.id
      })
      setSettings(editedSettings)
      alert('Settings saved successfully!')
    } catch (err: any) {
      alert(err.response?.data?.message || 'Failed to save settings')
    } finally {
      setSaving(false)
    }
  }

  // Check if current user is admin
  const membershipRecord = community?.members.find((m: Member) => m.user_id === currentUser?.id)
  const isAdmin = membershipRecord?.role === 'admin' && membershipRecord?.status === 'active'

  // Filter members by status
  const activeMembers = community?.members.filter(m => m.status === 'active') || []
  const pendingMembers = community?.members.filter(m => m.status === 'pending') || []

  if (loading) {
    return (
      <div className="min-h-screen flex items-center justify-center">
        <div className="text-gray-500">Loading...</div>
      </div>
    )
  }

  if (error || !community) {
    return (
      <div className="min-h-screen flex items-center justify-center">
        <div className="text-red-500">{error || 'Community not found'}</div>
      </div>
    )
  }

  if (!isAdmin) {
    return (
      <Layout title="Access Denied">
        <div className="container mx-auto px-4 py-8">
          <div className="bg-red-50 border border-red-200 rounded-lg p-8 text-center">
            <h2 className="text-2xl font-bold text-red-800 mb-4">Access Denied</h2>
            <p className="text-red-600 mb-6">You must be a community admin to access this page.</p>
            <Link
              href={`/communities/${id}`}
              className="px-6 py-2 bg-blue-600 text-white rounded hover:bg-blue-700"
            >
              Back to Community
            </Link>
          </div>
        </div>
      </Layout>
    )
  }

  return (
    <>
      <Head>
        <title>Admin - {community.name} - Karmyq</title>
      </Head>
      <Layout title={`Admin: ${community.name}`}>
        <div className="container mx-auto px-4 py-8">
          {/* Header */}
          <div className="flex items-center justify-between mb-6">
            <div>
              <Link
                href={`/communities/${id}`}
                className="text-blue-600 hover:text-blue-800 mb-2 inline-block"
              >
                ← Back to Community
              </Link>
              <h1 className="text-3xl font-bold">{community.name} - Admin Panel</h1>
            </div>
          </div>

          {/* Stats Cards */}
          <div className="grid md:grid-cols-4 gap-4 mb-6">
            <div className="bg-white rounded-lg shadow p-4">
              <div className="text-3xl font-bold text-blue-600">{activeMembers.length}</div>
              <div className="text-sm text-gray-600">Active Members</div>
            </div>
            <div className="bg-white rounded-lg shadow p-4">
              <div className="text-3xl font-bold text-yellow-600">{pendingMembers.length}</div>
              <div className="text-sm text-gray-600">Pending Requests</div>
            </div>
            <div className="bg-white rounded-lg shadow p-4">
              <div className="text-3xl font-bold text-green-600">{community.max_members}</div>
              <div className="text-sm text-gray-600">Max Capacity</div>
            </div>
            <div className="bg-white rounded-lg shadow p-4">
              <div className="text-3xl font-bold text-purple-600">
                {community.access_type === 'private' ? 'Private' : 'Public'}
              </div>
              <div className="text-sm text-gray-600">Access Type</div>
            </div>
          </div>

          {/* Tabs */}
          <div className="bg-white rounded-lg shadow">
            <div className="border-b border-gray-200">
              <nav className="flex">
                <button
                  onClick={() => setActiveTab('members')}
                  className={`px-6 py-4 font-medium ${
                    activeTab === 'members'
                      ? 'border-b-2 border-blue-600 text-blue-600'
                      : 'text-gray-600 hover:text-gray-800'
                  }`}
                >
                  Members ({activeMembers.length})
                </button>
                <button
                  onClick={() => setActiveTab('pending')}
                  className={`px-6 py-4 font-medium relative ${
                    activeTab === 'pending'
                      ? 'border-b-2 border-blue-600 text-blue-600'
                      : 'text-gray-600 hover:text-gray-800'
                  }`}
                >
                  Pending Requests ({pendingMembers.length})
                  {pendingMembers.length > 0 && (
                    <span className="absolute -top-1 -right-1 bg-red-500 text-white text-xs rounded-full w-5 h-5 flex items-center justify-center">
                      {pendingMembers.length}
                    </span>
                  )}
                </button>
                <button
                  onClick={() => setActiveTab('settings')}
                  className={`px-6 py-4 font-medium ${
                    activeTab === 'settings'
                      ? 'border-b-2 border-blue-600 text-blue-600'
                      : 'text-gray-600 hover:text-gray-800'
                  }`}
                >
                  Settings
                </button>
              </nav>
            </div>

            <div className="p-6">
              {/* Active Members Tab */}
              {activeTab === 'members' && (
                <div>
                  <h3 className="text-xl font-semibold mb-4">Manage Members</h3>
                  <div className="space-y-3">
                    {activeMembers.map((member) => (
                      <div
                        key={member.id}
                        className="flex items-center justify-between p-4 bg-gray-50 rounded-lg"
                      >
                        <div>
                          <div className="font-semibold">{member.user_name}</div>
                          <div className="text-sm text-gray-600">{member.user_email}</div>
                          <div className="text-xs text-gray-500">
                            Joined {new Date(member.joined_at).toLocaleDateString()}
                          </div>
                        </div>
                        <div className="flex items-center gap-3">
                          <select
                            value={member.role}
                            onChange={(e) => handleUpdateMemberRole(member.user_id, e.target.value)}
                            disabled={member.user_id === currentUser?.id || member.user_id === community.creator_id}
                            className="px-3 py-1 border border-gray-300 rounded text-sm disabled:bg-gray-100"
                          >
                            <option value="member">Member</option>
                            <option value="moderator">Moderator</option>
                            <option value="admin">Admin</option>
                          </select>
                          {member.user_id !== currentUser?.id && member.user_id !== community.creator_id && (
                            <button
                              onClick={() => handleRemoveMember(member.user_id, member.user_name)}
                              className="px-3 py-1 bg-red-100 text-red-700 rounded text-sm hover:bg-red-200"
                            >
                              Remove
                            </button>
                          )}
                          {member.user_id === community.creator_id && (
                            <span className="px-3 py-1 bg-purple-100 text-purple-700 rounded text-sm">
                              Creator
                            </span>
                          )}
                        </div>
                      </div>
                    ))}
                  </div>
                </div>
              )}

              {/* Pending Requests Tab */}
              {activeTab === 'pending' && (
                <div>
                  <h3 className="text-xl font-semibold mb-4">Pending Join Requests</h3>
                  {pendingMembers.length === 0 ? (
                    <p className="text-gray-500">No pending join requests.</p>
                  ) : (
                    <div className="space-y-3">
                      {pendingMembers.map((member) => (
                        <div
                          key={member.id}
                          className="flex items-center justify-between p-4 bg-yellow-50 border border-yellow-200 rounded-lg"
                        >
                          <div>
                            <div className="font-semibold">{member.user_name}</div>
                            <div className="text-sm text-gray-600">{member.user_email}</div>
                            <div className="text-xs text-gray-500">
                              Requested {new Date(member.joined_at).toLocaleDateString()}
                            </div>
                          </div>
                          <div className="flex items-center gap-2">
                            <button
                              onClick={() => handleApproveMember(member.user_id)}
                              className="px-4 py-2 bg-green-600 text-white rounded hover:bg-green-700"
                            >
                              Approve
                            </button>
                            <button
                              onClick={() => handleRejectMember(member.user_id)}
                              className="px-4 py-2 bg-red-600 text-white rounded hover:bg-red-700"
                            >
                              Reject
                            </button>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      ))}
                    </div>
                  )}
                </div>
              )}

              {/* Settings Tab */}
              {activeTab === 'settings' && editedSettings && (
                <div>
                  <h3 className="text-xl font-semibold mb-4">Community Settings</h3>
                  <p className="text-gray-600 mb-6">
                    Configure data retention and reputation decay settings for this community.
                  </p>

                  <div className="space-y-6">
                    {/* Data Retention Section */}
                    <div className="bg-gray-50 rounded-lg p-6">
                      <h4 className="font-semibold text-lg mb-4">Data Retention (TTL)</h4>
                      <p className="text-sm text-gray-600 mb-4">
                        Set how long different types of data are kept before automatic cleanup.
                      </p>
                      <div className="grid md:grid-cols-2 gap-4">
                        <div>
                          <label className="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 mb-1">
                            Help Requests (days)
                          </label>
                          <input
                            type="number"
                            value={editedSettings.request_ttl_days}
                            onChange={(e) => setEditedSettings({
                              ...editedSettings,
                              request_ttl_days: parseInt(e.target.value) || 60
                            })}
                            className="w-full px-4 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded"
                            min="1"
                            max="365"
                          />
                        </div>
                        <div>
                          <label className="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 mb-1">
                            Help Offers (days)
                          </label>
                          <input
                            type="number"
                            value={editedSettings.offer_ttl_days}
                            onChange={(e) => setEditedSettings({
                              ...editedSettings,
                              offer_ttl_days: parseInt(e.target.value) || 60
                            })}
                            className="w-full px-4 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded"
                            min="1"
                            max="365"
                          />
                        </div>
                        <div>
                          <label className="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 mb-1">
                            Completed Matches (days)
                          </label>
                          <input
                            type="number"
                            value={editedSettings.match_ttl_days}
                            onChange={(e) => setEditedSettings({
                              ...editedSettings,
                              match_ttl_days: parseInt(e.target.value) || 90
                            })}
                            className="w-full px-4 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded"
                            min="1"
                            max="365"
                          />
                        </div>
                        <div>
                          <label className="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 mb-1">
                            Notifications (days)
                          </label>
                          <input
                            type="number"
                            value={editedSettings.notification_ttl_days}
                            onChange={(e) => setEditedSettings({
                              ...editedSettings,
                              notification_ttl_days: parseInt(e.target.value) || 30
                            })}
                            className="w-full px-4 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded"
                            min="1"
                            max="365"
                          />
                        </div>
                        <div>
                          <label className="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 mb-1">
                            Messages (days)
                          </label>
                          <input
                            type="number"
                            value={editedSettings.message_ttl_days}
                            onChange={(e) => setEditedSettings({
                              ...editedSettings,
                              message_ttl_days: parseInt(e.target.value) || 90
                            })}
                            className="w-full px-4 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded"
                            min="1"
                            max="365"
                          />
                        </div>
                        <div>
                          <label className="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 mb-1">
                            Sessions (days)
                          </label>
                          <input
                            type="number"
                            value={editedSettings.session_ttl_days}
                            onChange={(e) => setEditedSettings({
                              ...editedSettings,
                              session_ttl_days: parseInt(e.target.value) || 30
                            })}
                            className="w-full px-4 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded"
                            min="1"
                            max="365"
                          />
                        </div>
                      </div>
                    </div>

                    {/* Reputation Decay Section */}
                    <div className="bg-gray-50 rounded-lg p-6">
                      <h4 className="font-semibold text-lg mb-4">Reputation Decay</h4>
                      <p className="text-sm text-gray-600 mb-4">
                        Configure how karma decays over time to encourage ongoing participation.
                      </p>
                      <div className="space-y-4">
                        <div className="flex items-center gap-3">
                          <input
                            type="checkbox"
                            id="karma_decay_enabled"
                            checked={editedSettings.karma_decay_enabled}
                            onChange={(e) => setEditedSettings({
                              ...editedSettings,
                              karma_decay_enabled: e.target.checked
                            })}
                            className="w-5 h-5 rounded"
                          />
                          <label htmlFor="karma_decay_enabled" className="font-medium">
                            Enable karma decay
                          </label>
                        </div>
                        {editedSettings.karma_decay_enabled && (
                          <div className="ml-8">
                            <label className="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 mb-1">
                              Decay half-life (months)
                            </label>
                            <p className="text-xs text-gray-500 mb-2">
                              Time for karma to decay to half its value without activity
                            </p>
                            <input
                              type="number"
                              value={editedSettings.karma_half_life_months}
                              onChange={(e) => setEditedSettings({
                                ...editedSettings,
                                karma_half_life_months: parseInt(e.target.value) || 6
                              })}
                              className="w-32 px-4 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded"
                              min="1"
                              max="24"
                            />
                          </div>
                        )}
                      </div>
                    </div>

                    {/* Save Button */}
                    <div className="flex justify-end gap-3">
                      <button
                        onClick={() => setEditedSettings(settings)}
                        className="px-6 py-2 bg-gray-200 text-gray-700 rounded hover:bg-gray-300"
                      >
                        Reset
                      </button>
                      <button
                        onClick={handleSaveSettings}
                        disabled={saving}
                        className="px-6 py-2 bg-blue-600 text-white rounded hover:bg-blue-700 disabled:bg-blue-400"
                      >
                        {saving ? 'Saving...' : 'Save Settings'}
                      </button>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                </div>
              )}
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </Layout>
    </>
  )
}
Tool reply2025-11-22T21:12:57.596Z

Tool reply2025-11-22T21:13:08.370Z
    95→feedApi.interceptors.request.use(authInterceptor)
    96→
    97→// Handle auth errors
    98→const errorInterceptor = (error: any) => {
    99→  if (error.response?.status === 401) {
   100→    if (typeof window !== 'undefined') {
   101→      localStorage.removeItem('token')
   102→      localStorage.removeItem('user')
   103→      window.location.href = '/login'
   104→    }
   105→  }
   106→  return Promise.reject(error)
   107→}
   108→
   109→api.interceptors.response.use((response) => response, errorInterceptor)
   110→communityApi.interceptors.response.use((response) => response, errorInterceptor)
   111→requestApi.interceptors.response.use((response) => response, errorInterceptor)
   112→notificationApi.interceptors.response.use((response) => response, errorInterceptor)
   113→messagingApi.interceptors.response.use((response) => response, errorInterceptor)
   114→reputationApi.interceptors.response.use((response) => response, errorInterceptor)
   115→feedApi.interceptors.response.use((response) => response, errorInterceptor)
   116→
   117→// Community API Methods
   118→export const communityService = {
   119→  // Communities
   120→  getCommunities: (params?: { status?: string; limit?: number; offset?: number; search?: string; location?: string; category?: string; has_space?: string; sort?: string }) =>
   121→    communityApi.get('/communities', { params }),
   122→
   123→  getMyCommunities: (user_id: string) =>
   124→    communityApi.get('/communities/my/communities', { params: { user_id } }),
   125→
   126→  getCommunity: (id: string) =>
   127→    communityApi.get(`/communities/${id}`),
   128→
   129→  createCommunity: (data: { name: string; description: string; location?: string; category?: string; creator_id: string; max_members?: number }) =>
   130→    communityApi.post('/communities', data),
   131→
   132→  updateCommunity: (id: string, data: { name?: string; description?: string; location?: string; category?: string; max_members?: number; user_id: string }) =>
   133→    communityApi.put(`/communities/${id}`, data),
   134→
   135→  archiveCommunity: (id: string, user_id: string) =>
   136→    communityApi.delete(`/communities/${id}`, { data: { user_id } }),
   137→
   138→  // Members
   139→  getMembers: (communityId: string) =>
   140→    communityApi.get(`/communities/${communityId}/members`),
   141→
   142→  addMember: (communityId: string, data: { user_id: string; invited_by?: string; role?: string }) =>
   143→    communityApi.post(`/communities/${communityId}/members`, data),
   144→
   145→  updateMember: (communityId: string, userId: string, data: { role?: string; status?: string; admin_user_id: string }) =>
   146→    communityApi.put(`/communities/${communityId}/members/${userId}`, data),
   147→
   148→  removeMember: (communityId: string, userId: string, admin_user_id: string) =>
   149→    communityApi.delete(`/communities/${communityId}/members/${userId}`, { data: { admin_user_id } }),
   150→
   151→  // Norms
   152→  getNorms: (communityId: string, params?: { status?: string }) =>
   153→    communityApi.get(`/communities/${communityId}/norms`, { params }),
   154→
   155→  getNorm: (communityId: string, normId: string) =>
   156→    communityApi.get(`/communities/${communityId}/norms/${normId}`),
   157→
   158→  createNorm: (communityId: string, data: { description: string; rationale?: string; created_by: string }) =>
   159→    communityApi.post(`/communities/${communityId}/norms`, data),
   160→
   161→  approveNorm: (communityId: string, normId: string, user_id: string) =>
   162→    communityApi.post(`/communities/${communityId}/norms/${normId}/approve`, { user_id }),
   163→
   164→  archiveNorm: (communityId: string, normId: string, user_id: string) =>
   165→    communityApi.delete(`/communities/${communityId}/norms/${normId}`, { data: { user_id } }),
   166→
   167→  // Join/Leave Community
   168→  joinCommunity: (communityId: string, data: { user_id: string; message?: string }) =>
   169→    communityApi.post(`/communities/${communityId}/join`, data),
   170→
   171→  leaveCommunity: (communityId: string, userId: string, admin_user_id: string) =>
   172→    communityApi.delete(`/communities/${communityId}/members/${userId}`, { data: { admin_user_id } }),
   173→
   174→  // Check membership status

    communityApi.patch(`/communities/${communityId}/settings`, data),

    communityApi.get(`/communities/${communityId}/settings/decay-preview`),

Session continuation summary
User2025-11-22T21:14:08.308Z

This session is being continued from a previous conversation that ran out of context. The conversation is summarized below: Analysis: Let me chronologically analyze the conversation:

  1. Session Start: This is a continuation from a previous session where E2E tests, performance testing, frontend integration, and documentation were completed.

  2. User Message 1: "Alright, what's remaining?"

  3. My Response: Listed completed tasks and suggested next steps including:

  4. Data Export API
  5. Admin UI
  6. Fix Feed Service schema issues

  7. Test Mobile App on simulators

  8. User Message 2: "Let's do the Near-term stuff.... but starting with 2, 3, 4 and then we can do the data export aspect."

  9. This means: Admin UI (2), Fix Feed Service (3), Test Mobile App (4), then Data Export last

  10. My Actions:

  11. Created todo list for all 4 items

  12. Launched 3 Task subagents to explore Feed Service issues, Admin UI needs, and Mobile App state

  13. Exploration Results:

  14. Feed Service: Critical schema mismatches in feedComposer.ts:
    • requests.requests should be requests.help_requests
    • helper_id should be responder_id
    • user_id should be requester_id
    • required_skills column doesn't exist (use category instead)
  15. Admin UI: Backend APIs exist but no frontend admin pages

  16. Mobile App: Structure exists but only feed screen implemented, needs npm install and simulator setup

  17. Feed Service Fix (COMPLETED):

  18. Fixed all schema references in services/feed-service/src/services/feedComposer.ts:

    • Changed requests.requests to requests.help_requests
    • Changed m.helper_id to m.responder_id
    • Changed r.user_id to r.requester_id
    • Changed m.helpee_id reference to proper join with r.requester_id
    • Changed r.required_skills to use r.category as proxy
    • Removed r.expected_duration (doesn't exist)

  19. Admin UI (IN PROGRESS):

  20. Created new admin page: apps/frontend/src/pages/communities/[id]/admin.tsx
  21. Added settings API methods to apps/frontend/src/lib/api.ts

Current work was adding the API methods for settings management, which I just completed.

Files modified in this session: - services/feed-service/src/services/feedComposer.ts - Multiple schema fixes - apps/frontend/src/pages/communities/[id]/admin.tsx - New admin page created - apps/frontend/src/lib/api.ts - Added settings API methods

Summary: 1. Primary Request and Intent: The user requested to work on "Near-term stuff" in a specific order: - Item 2: Create Admin UI for community settings management - Item 3: Fix Feed Service schema references in feedComposer.ts - Item 4: Test Mobile App on simulators - Then: Data Export API (JSON/CSV) last

Quote: "Let's do the Near-term stuff.... but starting with 2, 3, 4 and then we can do the data export aspect."

  1. Key Technical Concepts:
  2. PostgreSQL schema alignment (table names, column names)
  3. React/Next.js frontend with dynamic routing ([id]/admin.tsx)
  4. Community admin functionality (member management, settings, TTL configuration)
  5. Reputation decay configuration
  6. Feed composition algorithm with skill matching

  7. Expo/React Native mobile development

  8. Files and Code Sections:

  9. services/feed-service/src/services/feedComposer.ts - Critical bug fixes

    • Fixed all SQL queries to use correct schema
    • Key fixes: requests.requests → requests.help_requests, helper_id → responder_id, user_id → requester_id, removed required_skills (use category) typescript // Example fix in getUserBehavior: const helpsResult = await query(` SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM requests.matches m JOIN requests.help_requests r ON m.request_id = r.id WHERE (m.responder_id = $1 OR r.requester_id = $1) AND m.status = 'completed' AND m.completed_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '30 days' `, [userId]);

  10. apps/frontend/src/pages/communities/[id]/admin.tsx - NEW FILE CREATED

    • Complete admin dashboard with 3 tabs: Members, Pending Requests, Settings
    • Member role management (member/moderator/admin)
    • Pending join request approval/rejection
    • TTL settings for requests, offers, matches, notifications, messages, sessions
    • Karma decay configuration (enable/disable, half-life months)
    • Access control (only admins can view)

  11. apps/frontend/src/lib/api.ts - Added settings API methods ``typescript // Settings (Admin only) getSettings: (communityId: string) => communityApi.get(/communities/${communityId}/settings`),

    updateSettings: (communityId: string, data: { request_ttl_days?: number; offer_ttl_days?: number; match_ttl_days?: number; notification_ttl_days?: number; message_ttl_days?: number; session_ttl_days?: number; karma_decay_enabled?: boolean; karma_half_life_months?: number; user_id: string; }) => communityApi.patch(/communities/${communityId}/settings, data),

    getDecayPreview: (communityId: string) => communityApi.get(/communities/${communityId}/settings/decay-preview), ```

  12. Errors and fixes:

  13. Feed Service Schema Mismatches (Multiple):

    • requests.requests table doesn't exist → Fixed to requests.help_requests
    • helper_id column doesn't exist → Fixed to responder_id
    • helpee_id column doesn't exist → Fixed by joining to r.requester_id
    • user_id column doesn't exist → Fixed to requester_id
    • required_skills column doesn't exist → Used category as proxy
    • expected_duration column doesn't exist → Set to null

  14. Problem Solving:

  15. Completed: Fixed all schema mismatches in feedComposer.ts (5+ different query locations)
  16. Completed: Created comprehensive admin UI with member management, pending requests, and settings
  17. Completed: Added missing API methods for settings management
  18. Pending: Need to add link to admin page from community detail page
  19. Pending: Mobile app testing

  20. Pending: Data Export API

  21. All user messages:

  22. "Alright, what's remaining?"

  23. "Let's do the Near-term stuff.... but starting with 2, 3, 4 and then we can do the data export aspect."

  24. Pending Tasks:

  25. [COMPLETED] Fix Feed Service schema references in feedComposer.ts
  26. [IN PROGRESS] Create Admin UI for community settings management
  27. [PENDING] Test Mobile App on simulators

  28. [PENDING] Data Export API (JSON/CSV)

  29. Current Work: Just finished creating the Admin UI page and adding API methods:

  30. Created apps/frontend/src/pages/communities/[id]/admin.tsx with full functionality
  31. Added getSettings, updateSettings, getDecayPreview to communityService in api.ts

  32. The admin page includes: member management, pending request approval, TTL settings, karma decay config

  33. Optional Next Step: Continue with Admin UI completion by adding a link from the community detail page to the admin page (for admins only).
